attributes.action: The UK Public To Demand a General Election from our MP's
attributes.additional_details:
Conservative = Brexit
Labour = No Idea
Lib Dems = Remain
and there is sucha back log clear agenda clear Election.
attributes.background: The BREXIT battleground is being used to stiffle the peoples wish and democratic right. Both the Government and the Opposition areusing it as a football and we are fed up lets go to the polls.
